question: Help Ukraine
answer:
🧭 My Position

I firmly and consciously condemn the actions of the current Russian government, which rules through aggression, lies, and disinformation. I consider this regime illegitimate, as power in Russia has never been transferred through free and fair elections. The entire state apparatus relies on propaganda, strict censorship, and the suppression of dissent to manipulate public opinion and maintain the illusion of consent.

⚔️ The War as Proof of a Criminal Regime

I have opposed Russia’s actions against Ukraine since 2014. Even then, I viewed the annexation of Crimea as a military and political crime, a violation of international law and a betrayal of justice and peace.

When Russia launched its full-scale invasion on February 24, 2022, it became unmistakably clear: this regime survives solely through intimidation, violence, and lies.

It crushes any independent source of information, labeling truth as "fake news." Those who speak out face harassment, arrest, and imprisonment. This regime is built on fear and systematic deception, constantly inventing enemies to keep society under control.

🚪 Why I Had to Flee

Because of my position, I was subjected to pressure and threats and eventually forced to leave my country to protect my freedom and safety. What hurt the most was that many people close to me turned away simply because I refused to support war or justify the killing of innocent people.

I will never accept the term "collateral damage" — it dehumanizes the victims, hides the brutal reality of war, and reduces human tragedy to mere statistics.

🔇 The Truth They Try to Silence

I see how meticulously these crimes are being concealed.
Here is one example: an Instagram post documenting a Russian strike on civilians.

These attacks destroy hospitals, schools, homes, and critical infrastructure. They kill and injure women, children, and the elderly. In Russia, this truth is silenced, and anyone who dares expose it is met with repression, criminal charges, and prison sentences.

🛠️ I Don’t Stay Silent — I Act

Silence destroys truth, and one-sided information destroys the freedom to think.
That’s why I create and maintain platforms where people can share information freely — without fear for their safety or freedom.

These are spaces for thought, testimony, experience, and dissent — not controlled by any ideology. I do not dictate what is true. I provide space for people to speak, and I trust readers to decide for themselves what to believe, question, and understand.

I am convinced that only through diverse perspectives can we truly see the world, not just distorted shadows of it.
That’s why my platforms are free, independent, and open to all. I fund them personally — emotionally, physically, and financially — because I believe in what they stand for.

  • WoPr — 🌐 free website creation and hosting with WordPress CMS.

  • Wikli — 🧩 WordPress-based website builder (2025).

  • Protest — 🎨 collection of my SVG artwork (CC0 license).

🌍 What I Believe In

I want to live in a world where people are not afraid to speak the truth, where every voice matters.
And I’m ready to fight for that world.
